column4: if its virtualbox then those cpus would be fixed. i think that makes sense

that is to say if you have 4 cpu's and assign 2/4 to vbox then it would have to pick the cpus. there is no way it can meaningfully divide the time so as to migrate the vm between cpus. (at least that would be my suspicion)
im just not sure what your question is exactly
how many cpus are listed in /proc/cpuinfo
